00035 extern PGM_VOID_P pbuffer;
00036 #else
00037 extern U8   code *pbuffer;
00038 #endif

00058 Bool usb_user_read_request(U8 type, U8 request)
00059 {
00060 U8  descriptor_type ;
00061 U8  string_type     ;
00062 
00063    string_type     = Usb_read_byte();
00064    descriptor_type = Usb_read_byte();
00065    switch(request)
00066    {
00067       case GET_DESCRIPTOR:
00068 
00069          switch (descriptor_type)
00070          {
00071             case REPORT:
00072                hid_get_report();
00073                return TRUE;
00074                break;
00075 
00076             case HID:
00077                hid_get_hid_descriptor();
00078                return TRUE;
00079                break;
00080             default:
00081                return FALSE;
00082                break;
00083          }
00084          break;
00085       case SET_CONFIGURATION:
00086          switch (descriptor_type)
00087          {
00088             case SET_REPORT:
00089                hid_set_report();
00090                return TRUE;
00091                break;
00092 
00093             default:
00094                return FALSE;
00095                break;
00096          }
00097          break;
00098    case GET_INTERFACE:
00099 //      usb_hid_set_idle();
00100       usb_hid_get_interface();
00101       return TRUE;
00102       break;
00103 
00104       default:
00105          return FALSE;
00106          break;
00107 
00108    }
00109    return FALSE;
00110 }

00122 void usb_user_endpoint_init(U8 conf_nb)
00123 {
00124   usb_configure_endpoint(EP_MOUSE_IN,      \
00125                          TYPE_INTERRUPT,     \
00126                          DIRECTION_IN,  \
00127                          SIZE_8,       \
00128                          ONE_BANK,     \
00129                          NYET_ENABLED);
00130 
00131 
00132 }

00144 Bool usb_user_get_descriptor(U8 type, U8 string)
00145 {
00146    switch(type)
00147    {
00148       case STRING_DESCRIPTOR:
00149          switch (string)
00150          {
00151             case LANG_ID:
00152                data_to_transfer = sizeof (usb_user_language_id);
00153                pbuffer = &(usb_user_language_id.bLength);
00154                return TRUE;
00155                break;
00156             case MAN_INDEX:
00157                data_to_transfer = sizeof (usb_user_manufacturer_string_descriptor);
00158                pbuffer = &(usb_user_manufacturer_string_descriptor.bLength);
00159                return TRUE;
00160                break;
00161             case PROD_INDEX:
00162                data_to_transfer = sizeof (usb_user_product_string_descriptor);
00163                pbuffer = &(usb_user_product_string_descriptor.bLength);
00164                return TRUE;
00165                break;
00166             case SN_INDEX:
00167                data_to_transfer = sizeof (usb_user_serial_number);
00168                pbuffer = &(usb_user_serial_number.bLength);
00169                return TRUE;
00170                break;
00171             default:
00172                return FALSE;
00173          }
00174       default:
00175          return FALSE;
00176    }
00177 
00178    return FALSE;
00179 }

00181 
00190 void hid_get_report(void)
00191 {
00192 
00193 U16 wLength;
00194 U8  nb_byte;
00195 bit zlp=0;
00196 
00197 
00198 
00199    LSB(wInterface)=Usb_read_byte();
00200    MSB(wInterface)=Usb_read_byte();
00201 
00202    data_to_transfer = sizeof(usb_hid_report_descriptor_mouse);
00203    pbuffer = &(usb_hid_report_descriptor_mouse.report[0]);
00204 
00205    LSB(wLength) = Usb_read_byte();      
00206    MSB(wLength) = Usb_read_byte();
00207    Usb_ack_receive_setup() ;                  
00208 
00209    if (wLength > data_to_transfer)
00210    {
00211       if ((data_to_transfer % EP_CONTROL_LENGTH) == 0) { zlp = TRUE; }
00212       else { zlp = FALSE; }                   
00213    }
00214    else
00215    {
00216       data_to_transfer = (U8)wLength;         
00217    }
00218 
00219    while((data_to_transfer != 0) && (!Is_usb_receive_out()))
00220    {
00221       while(!Is_usb_read_control_enabled());
00222 
00223       nb_byte=0;
00224       while(data_to_transfer != 0)        
00225       {
00226          if(nb_byte++==EP_CONTROL_LENGTH) 
00227          {
00228             break;
00229          }
00230 #ifndef AVRGCC
00231          Usb_write_byte(*pbuffer++);
00232 #else    // AVRGCC does not support point to PGM space
00233 #warning with avrgcc assumes devices descriptors are stored in the lower 64Kbytes of on-chip flash memory
00234          Usb_write_byte(pgm_read_byte_near((unsigned int)pbuffer++));
00235 #endif
00236          data_to_transfer --;
00237       }
00238       Usb_send_control_in();
00239    }
00240 
00241    Usb_send_control_in();
00242 
00243    if(Is_usb_receive_out()) { Usb_ack_receive_out(); return; } 
00244    if(zlp == TRUE)        { Usb_send_control_in(); }
00245 
00246    while(!Is_usb_receive_out());
00247    Usb_ack_receive_out();
00248 }
00249 
00250 
00251 
00260 void hid_set_report (void)
00261 {
00262    Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00263    Usb_send_control_in();
00264 
00265    while(!Is_usb_receive_out());
00266    Usb_ack_receive_out();
00267    Usb_send_control_in();
00268 
00269 }

00280 void usb_hid_set_idle (void)
00281 {
00282   U8 dummy;
00283   dummy = Usb_read_byte();
00284   dummy = Usb_read_byte();
00285   LSB(wInterface)=Usb_read_byte();
00286   MSB(wInterface)=Usb_read_byte();
00287 
00288   Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00289 
00290   Usb_send_control_in();                       /* send a ZLP for STATUS phase */
00291   while(!Is_usb_in_ready());
00292 }
00293

00303 void usb_hid_get_interface (void)
00304 {
00305   U8 dummy;
00306   dummy = Usb_read_byte();
00307   dummy = Usb_read_byte();
00308   LSB(wInterface)=Usb_read_byte();
00309   MSB(wInterface)=Usb_read_byte();
00310 
00311   Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00312 
00313   Usb_send_control_in();                       /* send a ZLP for STATUS phase */
00314   while(!Is_usb_in_ready());
00315 }

00325 void hid_get_hid_descriptor(void)
00326 {
00327 
00328 U16 wLength;
00329 U8  nb_byte;
00330 bit zlp=0;
00331 
00332 
00333 
00334    LSB(wInterface)=Usb_read_byte();
00335    MSB(wInterface)=Usb_read_byte();
00336 
00337    data_to_transfer = sizeof(usb_conf_desc.hid_mouse);
00338    pbuffer = &(usb_conf_desc.hid_mouse.bLength);
00339 
00340    LSB(wLength) = Usb_read_byte();      
00341    MSB(wLength) = Usb_read_byte();
00342    Usb_ack_receive_setup() ;                  
00343 
00344    if (wLength > data_to_transfer)
00345    {
00346       if ((data_to_transfer % EP_CONTROL_LENGTH) == 0) { zlp = TRUE; }
00347       else { zlp = FALSE; }                   
00348    }
00349    else
00350    {
00351       data_to_transfer = (U8)wLength;         
00352    }
00353 
00354    while((data_to_transfer != 0) && (!Is_usb_receive_out()))
00355    {
00356       while(!Is_usb_read_control_enabled());
00357 
00358       nb_byte=0;
00359       while(data_to_transfer != 0)        
00360       {
00361          if(nb_byte++==EP_CONTROL_LENGTH) 
00362          {
00363             break;
00364          }
00365 #ifndef AVRGCC
00366          Usb_write_byte(*pbuffer++);
00367 #else    // AVRGCC does not support point to PGM space
00368 #warning with avrgcc assumes devices descriptors are stored in the lower 64Kbytes of on-chip flash memory
00369          Usb_write_byte(pgm_read_byte_near((unsigned int)pbuffer++));
00370 #endif
00371          data_to_transfer --;
00372       }
00373       Usb_send_control_in();
00374    }
00375 
00376    Usb_send_control_in();
00377 
00378    if(Is_usb_receive_out()) { Usb_ack_receive_out(); return; } 
00379    if(zlp == TRUE)        { Usb_send_control_in(); }
00380 
00381    while(!Is_usb_receive_out());
00382    Usb_ack_receive_out();
00383 }
